name: Care Package
short_description: to spread the idea of creating a Emergency Care Package of sorts that can be distributed via hand out or the web.. What I am getting at is the creation of a easy to use software suite that contains information on how to survive disasters or emergency situations in general. The idea would work similar to what Anonymous offers  with their "Earthquake in a Box and provide a means to get info out to people and also help defeat censorship
summary: A package of free or open source software for Emergency Purposes
